name: David Milch
description:
"The Sopranos", "The Wire", and "Deadwood" are considered some of the greatest television shows of all time.

All aired on HBO.

All aired in the early 2000s.

All featured large ensemble casts.

All featured a lot of swearing. A LOT of fucking swearing.

All were created by men named David: Chase for Sopranos, Simon for Wire, Milch for Deadwood.

All were created by Jews?

Two out of three ain't bad...
